LanguageData.AS_WHE_WAESword_Re.label: Ancient Elven Knight Sword (Replica)
LanguageData.AS_WHE_WAESword_Re.description: A replica of an ancient elf knight sword, recreated with half-elf technology. Uranium is used for the blade, giving it a black finish. The sharpness is as good as the original, but the ability to assist the user in close combat has not been reproduced.
LanguageData.AS_WHE_WAESword_Re.tools.0.label: handle
LanguageData.AS_WHE_WAESword_Re.tools.1.label: point
LanguageData.AS_WHE_WAESword_Re.tools.2.label: edge
